segments.text: I notice the boy's precarious position on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that he's putting himself in danger like that, just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second now, and he doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being reckless and not thinking about the consequences of his actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get down from the stool safely, without causing any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be encouraging his risky behavior, which makes me even more angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've ever considered the danger they're putting themselves in, just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they need to learn that some things aren't worth the risk, no matter how tempting they may be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that the woman isn't paying attention to what's happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
